sentences.sContent: Falsehood is the jockey of misfortune.
All this adds up to a true test for horse and jockey and that is why The Grand National is the race that most jockeys owners and trainers want to win.
sentences.sContent_eng: All this adds up to a true test for horse and jockey and that is why The Grand National is the race that most jockeys owners and trainers want to win.
sentences.sCn: 综上所诉，英国国家越野障碍赛马是一项真正检验马匹和骑手的比赛，这也是为什么不论是骑手，马匹的拥有者还是驯马师都想赢得一场比赛。

synos.tran: 操作工；驾驶员；赛马的骑师

trans.tranOther: someone who rides horses in races

trans.tranCn: 〔为获得最佳位置、最有利形势或最大权力而〕激烈竞争
trans.tranOther: to compete strongly to get into the best position or situation, or to get the most power
